content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *ina is a suede™ crocheted and beaded bikini top that we have stitched to a ready to wear gauze skirt with elastic shirred waist creating a fabulous summer dress berroco * picture shows pattern attached to a store-bought skirt finished measurements bra fits bust 32 34-36-38 see schematic for cup size materials berroco suede 50 grs 3 balls #3714 hopalong cassidy for all sizes crochet hook size 4 00 mm f or size to obtain gauge purchased skirt with wide elastic waistband optional 7 mm glass beads 14 black 24 green 32 clear
